import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import Rating from '../components/Rating' import products from '../products' const ProductScreen = ({ match }) => { const [product, setproduct] = useState({}) useEffect(() => { const fetchProduct = async () => { const res = await axios.get(`/api/products/${match.params.id}`) setproduct(res.data) } fetchProduct() }, []) return (
Go Back

{product.name}

 Price: ${product.price} Description: ${product.description} Status: ${product.countInStock > 0 ? 'In Stock' : 'Out of Stock'}
) } export default ProductScreen
